channel.title: Hiring staff for Ruin-Scape
channel.description:
################################################################################################ Hello everyone!
I am currently looking for 2-3 people to help me with my server. The job listings are below
1. 1 hoster (Not Hamachi)
2. 1-2 Java Coders (Must know java pretty well)
If you feel up to the job, please PM me...If you can. I will send you the source straight away, so be prepared. Thanks! ################################################################################################ [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 24, 2007, 04:51:38 AM[/size][hr][quote="Runer King"]################################################################################################ Hello everyone!
I am currently looking for 2-3 people to help me with my server. The job listings are below
1. 1 hoster (Not Hamachi)
2. 1-2 Java Coders (Must know java pretty well)
If you feel up to the job, please PM me...If you can. I will send you the source straight away, so be prepared. Thanks! ################################################################################################[/quote]
Any takers? I really want to fill up some of those empty admin slots.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 24, 2007, 07:19:56 PM[/size][hr]Seriously...I need some help...!
